string.value: #b#@1032101:##k in #bEllinia#k will welcome you if you give her the Ocarina. Let's go see her.
The #rAncient Bow#k is Solomon's Bow that was used to eliminate the demon. It is said to have been sealed in #b#m101010102##k, so let's head over there.
#b#@9201122:##k in #b#m101010102##k says he'd like to restore his lost memory.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 1200 Able to proceed to 'Restoring the Memory of the Ancient Bow' as next quest.
It's the Ocarina. I can listen to the sound of the Ocarina any time of the day. You have some pitch issues here and there, but I always appreciate the sound of the Ocarina. It makes me happy!
Good to see you, adventurer. What brings you here to see me? Have I heard the legend about the Ancient Bow?\n\nAre you talking about #rSolomon's Bow#k that was used to defeat the demon? Of course!
According to the legend, it was sealed after killing the demon.\n\nI don't know why it was sealed, but you'll be able to find #b#p9201122##k in #b#m101010103##k.
Are you going to keep playing the Ocarina?

...

Who are you?

Why have you come to see me?

Solomon's Bow?

Is that my name?

I don't remember...
But it sounds familiar.
